    • ViewGUI

      protected ViewGUI(ClientGUI client)
      ViewGUI constructor used by the create(it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientGUI, int) factory method. This constructor is protected. To create a ViewGUI object, use create(it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientGUI, int)
      Parameters:
      client - The client that holds the view

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static ViewGUI create(ClientGUI client, int playerNumber)
      Factory method to create a ViewGUI instance
      Parameters:
      client - The client that holds the view
      playerNumber - Number of players in the match, [2-4].
      Returns:
      An object of a ViewGUI subclass (either TwoPlayersViewGUI, ThreePlayersViewGUI or FourPlayersViewGUI)

    • print

      public void print()
      Update all the panels (except for players, which are handled by subclasses) on the view with the latest information and repaint the frame
      Specified by:
      print in class View<ClientGUI>

    • drawPlayer

      protected void drawPlayer(JPanel playerPanel, Player player, List<Tower> towers, String team)
      Draw the school, coins, assistant number, last played assistant (if applicable) of the provided player and towers on the given panel
      Parameters:
      playerPanel - The panel where player information is drawn
      player - A player object
      towers - A list of towers to draw onto the tower space of the school
      team - The team of the player (nullable) to be displayed in the panel title
